summary: Initialize a Temporal Convolutional Neural Network (TempCNN) classification model
description: Creates and configures a Temporal Convolutional Neural Network (TempCNN) model for time-series data. Parameters such as the convolutional architecture, dense layers, optimizer, and learning rate schedule can be specified.

parameters.name: cnn_layers
parameters.description: A list specifying the number of filters in each convolutional layer. Defaults to [64, 64, 64].

parameters.name: cnn_kernels
parameters.description: A list specifying the kernel size for each convolutional layer. Must match the number of CNN layers. Defaults to [5, 5, 5].

parameters.name: cnn_dropout_rates
parameters.description: A list of dropout rates for each convolutional layer. Must match the number of CNN layers. Defaults to [0.2, 0.2, 0.2].

parameters.name: dense_layer_nodes
parameters.description: The number of nodes in the dense layer following the convolutional layers. Defaults to 256.

parameters.name: dense_layer_dropout_rate
parameters.description: The dropout rate for the dense layer. Defaults to 0.5.

parameters.name: optimizer
parameters.description: The optimizer to use for training. Defaults to 'adam'. Supported values include 'adam', 'adabound', 'adabelief', 'madagrad', 'nadam', 'qhadam', 'radam', 'swats', and 'yogi'.

parameters.name: learning_rate
parameters.description: The initial learning rate for training. Defaults to 0.0005.

parameters.name: epsilon
parameters.description: The epsilon value for numerical stability in optimizers. Defaults to 1e-8.

parameters.name: weight_decay
parameters.description: The weight decay (L2 penalty) value for regularization. Defaults to 1e-6.

parameters.name: lr_decay_epochs
parameters.description: The number of epochs after which the learning rate is decayed. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: lr_decay_rate
parameters.description: The rate at which the learning rate is decayed after the specified number of epochs. Defaults to 0.95.

parameters.name: epochs
parameters.description: The number of training epochs. Defaults to 150.

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.description: The size of batches for training. Defaults to 64.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator. If `null`, no seed is used, and results may vary.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: If true, log training progress (loss/accuracy) during fitting.

returns.description: An untrained TempCNN classification model instance.

links.title: Pelletier, C., Webb, G. I., & Petitjean, F. (2019). Temporal Convolutional Neural Network for the Classification of Satellite Image Time Series
